## DSLRule type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A rule can be expressed at any of the three DSL levels.

This union type enables seamless mixing of rules at different abstraction levels within a single policy. Each rule type can be transformed to any other level using the transformation functions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DSLRule = IntentRule | PatternRule | DimensionalRule;
```
**References:** [IntentRule](./change-detector-core.intentrule.md)<!-- -->, [PatternRule](./change-detector-core.patternrule.md)<!-- -->, [DimensionalRule](./change-detector-core.dimensionalrule.md)
